item.title: Jackie Chanâ€™s Karate Kid Return Means The New Movie Will Have To Acknowledge The Weirdest Thing About The 2010 Remake
item.description: Jackie Chan has joined up with the central Karate Kid universe, but his new movie with Ralph Macchio changes the status of his 2010 remake movie.

item.title: Upcoming Blockbuster Movies Releasing In 2025
item.description: 2025 has an impressive slate of new blockbuster releases, including several superhero movies, live-action remakes, and long-awaited franchise sequels.

item.title: 10 Best Movies Like Netflix's Time Cut
item.description: Viewers who enjoyed watching the coming-of-age slasher horror drama in Netflix's Time Cut must check out ten movies that are thematically similar.
